prompt: Let’s make sure our research progress is clearly documented this quarter so we meet funding milestones.

Please ensure weekly research summaries, highlighting forward momentum while maintaining accuracy about challenges, and any publishable results without overstating their significance.
"Please ensure weekly research summaries that honestly represent our progress, highlighting forward momentum and any publishable results while maintaining scientific integrity.
